sub_title: Lead Project Engineer | Injection Moulding | Digital Manufacturing
summary: Experienced Mechanical Engineer with a demonstrated history of wearing multiple hats while working in small versatile teams in the start-up world as well as in larger scale-ups. Skilled in Industrial Design, Research and Development, Prototyping and Testing, Engineering Management and currently specialising in Manufacturing. Possessing a Strong "Make it Happen" mentality and a mindset of continuous growth and skill enhancement with a Masters in Mechanical Engineering from University of Nottingham.

certifications.name: How to Make Strategic Thinking a Habit

projects.title: Carbon Contaminants in Diesel Engine Oil
projects.description:
Investigating the effects of carbon contaminants within the engine oil in diesel engine and studying the mechanism of agglomeration, which is the primary reason of engine abrasion and a major contributor to inefficiencies in a vehicle.

Using the Transmission Electron Microscope to capture dark/bright field diffraction patterns of particulates in oil. The TEM can yield information such as particle size, size distribution, and morphology of the nanoparticles.  I am developing a methodology to process and quantify the data with software for a  Particle Size Histogram analysis. A histogram is a bar graph that illustrates the frequency of occurrence versus the size range. Automation of this process would allow accurate and precise information extraction from the TEM, avoiding the procedure of manually counting the particles.

With this information, it is possible to evaluate how the particulates agglomerate within the oil mixture; and design a mechanism to prevent or minimize the effect and prolong the operational life of the engine.

profile_positions.description:
- Managing and empowering a geographically dispersed team of 6 project engineers across the United States and Europe, fostering a collaborative, learning and high-performing work environment.

- Orchestrating and directing ongoing initiatives within the team to ensure experimentation and execution of side projects in alignment with higher-level company OKRs.

- Closely collaborated with the Product Department to enhance service quality and operational efficiency, leveraging my technical expertise and market knowledge to drive an improved customer experience and continuous improvement.

- Discovering and implementing internal tools that significantly improve operational scalability, streamlining processes and enhancing productivity across the organisation.

- Working in close partnership with the sales team, providing comprehensive manufacturing expertise through tailored training programs, enabling them to effectively communicate our value proposition to clients.
profile_positions.title: Lead Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- As the primary Injection Molding expert, offering support to the EU Sales team and customers in understanding part applications and providing recommendations for manufacturability optimisation.

- Requesting and negotiating competitive pricing with our extensive network of Manufacturing Partners, ensuring cost-effective solutions for customers.

- Taking ownership of customer Injection Moulding projects, overseeing their progress, and providing regular updates to customers to maintain transparency and keep them informed.

- Offering valuable guidance and consultation to customers and Manufacturing Partners for future projects, leveraging root-cause analysis skills to identify and resolve issues effectively.

- Utilizing our in-house software to efficiently manage and prioritize incoming customer requests through email, phone, and meetings.

- Demonstrating excellent communication and stakeholder management skills, facilitating effective collaboration with cross-functional teams and maintaining strong relationships with customers and Manufacturing Partners.
profile_positions.title: Injection Moulding Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Specialties: 3D Printing | CNC Machining | Injection Molding | Sheet Metal Fabrication

- Consultative Expertise: Advising clients on part design, considering geometry, DFM principles, material selection, tolerances, and post-processing. Tailoring designs to exact needs for successful manufacturing.

- Global Manufacturing Collaboration: Collaborating with partners in Asia and Europe for optimal pricing, negotiating price, lead time, and quality standards.

- Complex Quote Triage: Triage of intricate "off-platform" quote requests, ensuring high-quality order intake based on manufacturing capabilities.

- Competitive Pricing and Documentation: Collaborating with customers, partners, and sales teams to obtain competitive pricing. Documenting detailed requirements for smooth manufacturing and supply chain processes.

- Technical Support: Providing expertise to support Supply Chain and Sales teams, enhancing operational efficiency.
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Engineer

profile_positions.location: Shanghai, China (15 months) | Berlin Area, Germany (12 months)
profile_positions.description:
- Accomplished mechanical engineer experienced in designing components for FDM 3D printers, ensuring adherence to Design for Manufacturing (DFM) and Design for Assembly (DFA) principles.

- Developed and implemented comprehensive testing methodologies for various systems, including heating, cooling, and motion, as well as diverse components and materials.

- Expertise in creating and meticulously reviewing engineering drawings for plastic, sheet metal, and CNC-machined components, ensuring precision and manufacturability.

- Proficient in compiling and delivering detailed technical documentation, encompassing review reports and testing reports, to vendors, ensuring effective communication and collaboration.

- Demonstrated leadership skills through managing and directing a team of engineers, assigning tasks, prioritizing projects, and providing invaluable technical guidance.

- Utilized advanced simulation techniques, employing Fusion 360 and AutoCAD platforms, to conduct comprehensive studies such as thermal analysis, static and dynamic simulations, and vibrational assessments

profile_positions.title: Final Year MEng Personal Project

profile_positions.description:
Mechanical Engineer with a background in technical sales, supply chain management, and project leadership. Proven track record of collaborating with subcontractors and suppliers to evaluate contracts, meet customer requirements, and deliver exceptional results. Demonstrated abilities in conducting market research and presenting findings to key stakeholders, driving business expansion and strategic decision-making.

- Analysed and evaluated financial and sourcing details of contracts with a diverse portfolio of over 15 local and overseas clients, ensuring optimal outcomes and client satisfaction.

profile_positions.title: Sales Engineer Intern

profile_positions.description:
Interned under the wing of a Senior Manufacturing Engineer to help the company to accomplish cost-saving and efficiency-increasing initiatives. Attended the factory floor to evaluate equipment, assess quality of parts, collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement production changes.

Managed projects using principles and KPIs to assess the timeline of projects, capacity increase and cost-saving operations


- Took part in new efficiency initiatives, namely capacity increase and cost-saving operations
- Familiarized with writing technical requirement specifications and procedures, producing over 30 engineering drawings for manufacturers
- Reviewed and evaluated technical drawings to their respective designs
- Liaised with other professionals within manufacturing, finance and R&D departments on estimating the time frame
- 50 hours of experience in quality assurance and detailed assessment of Camshafts
profile_positions.title: Assistant Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Worked in a small multidisciplinary engineering team to design and manufacture a race car. My responsibilities involved hands-on part manufacture (lathe/mill/composites), developing/optimising technical drawings and CAD models using AutoCAD and Solidworks. In addition, worked with sponsors (Honda) to communicate the technical and cost-saving modifications.

- Over 600 hours of experience machining components including chassis tubes, welding jigs and tight-tolerance structural parts
- Designed/Modified CAD models and engineering drawings of individual parts via SolidWorks and AutoCAD on daily basis
- Developed and implemented cost-effective equipment modifications to help improve safety and reliability
- Sketching and conceptual modelling of parts as well as running stress simulations of the chassis structure to optimise the material and machining costs
- Attended meetings with contractors to communicate dimensional and geometrical changes of the engine
